typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Variable Name|Question Title|Possible Options Code|Description} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> projectlist
source(output(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PROJECT_TITLE as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPROJECT
source(output(
		PROJECT_STAGE_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROJECT_STAGE_CODE as string,
		PROJECT_STAGE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPROJECTSTAGE
source(output(
		ITC_SECTION_SR_KEY as integer,
		ITC_SECTION_CODE as string,
		ITC_SECTION_DESC as string,
		ITC_SECTION_DESC_LONG as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMITCSECTION
DIMPROJECTSTAGE select(mapColumn(
		PROJECT_STAGE_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_STAGE_CODE,
		PROJECT_STAGE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectStage
DIMPROJECT select(mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_ID,
		PROJECT_TITLE,
		CREATED_BY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProject
projectlist, SelectProject lookup(upper(trim({Project Title})) == upper(trim(PROJECT_TITLE)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupProject
LookupProject, SelectStage lookup(upper(trim(Stage)) == upper(trim(PROJECT_STAGE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupStage
DIMITCSECTION select(mapColumn(
		ITC_SECTION_SR_KEY,
		ITC_SECTION_CODE,
		ITC_SECTION_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSection
LookupStage, SelectSection lookup(upper(trim(Section)) == upper(trim(ITC_SECTION_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSection
LookupSection derive(BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = 'ProjectsList.csv',
		CREATED_BY = 'ProjectsList.csv',
		UPDATED_BY = 'ProjectsList.csv',
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ITC_SECTION_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_STAGE_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FactProjectStage
